verses.roman:
tasmāt samarathas tasya
sutaḥ satyarathas tataḥ
āsīd upagurus tasmād
upagupto 'gni-sambhavaḥ

synonyms: tasmāt—from Kṣemādhi; samarathaḥ—a son named Samaratha; tasya—from Samaratha; sutaḥ—son; satyarathaḥ—Satyaratha; tataḥ—from him (Satyaratha); āsīt—was born; upaguruḥ—Upaguru; tasmāt—from him; upaguptaḥ—Upagupta; agni-sambhavaḥ—a partial expansion of the demigod Agni.
translation: The son of Kṣemādhi was Samaratha, and his son was Satyaratha. The son of Satyaratha was Upaguru, and the son of Upaguru was Upagupta, a partial expansion of the fire-god.
